t:type.name: IpcdDevice
t:type.t:description: Represents an IPCD device that is currently in the database

t:attribute.name: protocolAddress
t:attribute.description: The protocol address of the IPCD device

t:attribute.name: driverAddress
t:attribute.description: The driver address of the IPCD device if it has been paired

t:attribute.name: accountId
t:attribute.description: The ID of the account that currently has the IPCD device paired

t:attribute.name: placeId
t:attribute.description: The ID of the place where the IPCD device is paired

t:attribute.name: created
t:attribute.description: The timestamp the IPCD record was created

t:attribute.name: modified
t:attribute.description: The timestamp the IPCD record was last modified

t:attribute.name: lastConnected
t:attribute.description: The timestamp the device last established a new session with the platform

t:attribute.name: vendor
t:attribute.description: The vendor reported by the device

t:attribute.name: model
t:attribute.description: The model reported by the device

t:attribute.name: sn
t:attribute.description: The serial number reported by the device

t:attribute.name: ipcdver
t:attribute.description: The version of IPCD the device reports it supports

t:attribute.name: firmware
t:attribute.description: The firmware running on the IPCD device if reported

t:attribute.name: connState
t:attribute.description: The current connection state of the IPCD device

t:attribute.name: registrationState
t:attribute.description: The current registration state of the device
